subject: [Radiance-general] Merge hdr-images
body:
Hi,

You can also try
RadDisplay<http://deluminaelab.com/en/raddisplay_details.html>,
on tab ImagesManipulation you have section Compare Images, where you can
add, substract images and do other manipulations (you can also manually
change pcomb command inside the program to tune results better).

Hope it helps,
Marija
